function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inhibited social interaction due to social distancing may exacerbate psychological distress.","Impact":"Increased psychological distress during the pandemic, leading to mental health problems.","Mitigation":"Promote virtual social interaction through technology and encourage alternative forms of exercise that can improve mental well-being.","Technologies":"Virtual communication platforms, exergames, and home-based exercise apps.","People":"Individuals practicing social distancing.","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals."},{"Description":"Restricted collective activities during the pandemic have triggered mental health problems.","Impact":"Deterioration of mental health due to lack of collective activities.","Mitigation":"Promote alternative forms of exercise and physical activities at home to alleviate mental illness symptoms.","Technologies":"Home-based exercise apps, virtual exercise classes, exergames.","People":"Individuals experiencing limited collective activities.","Owner":"Health organizations, fitness professionals."},{"Description":"Lack of physical activity and group physical activity due to social distancing measures.","Impact":"Reduced physical activity and increased sedentary behavior leading to health issues.","Mitigation":"Encourage home-based exercises, virtual exercise classes, and alternative forms of physical activity to maintain physical health.","Technologies":"Home-based exercise apps, virtual exercise platforms, exergames.","People":"Individuals practicing social distancing.","Owner":"Health organizations, fitness professionals."}]}
